data.comment: The big names in today's match at Deepdale have now been confirmed.
The match is underway. Coventry have kicked-off.
In the minute 18, Daniel Johnson scores to make it 1-0 at Deepdale.
Andrew Hughes (Preston) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Keith Stroud blows to end the first-half.
In the minute 46, The ref has blown to start the second-half. Preston kick-off.
Sean Maguire puts the ball in the net and the home team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 2-0.
Brad Potts is replacing Alan Browne for Preston at Deepdale.
In the minute 59, The away team have replaced Ben Sheaf with Maxime Biamou. This is the first substitution made today by Mark Robins.
Mark Robins (Coventry) is making a second substitution, with Jordan Shipley replacing Callum O`Hare.
Alex Neil is making the team's second substitution at Deepdale with Ryan Ledson replacing Paul Gallagher.
In the minute 63, Josh Earl is booked for the home team.
Emil Riis Jakobsen is on a sub for Josh Earl for Preston.
Sam McCallum is replacing Ryan Giles for the away team.
In the minute 70, Coventry make their fourth substitution with Will Bapaga replacing Jamie Allen.
Sean Maguire (Preston) gets a yellow card.
The match is over. Final score 2-0.
